actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Ferguson amendment was withdrawn.
Substitute (A013) offered by Mr. Ferguson to the Burgess amendment (A012).
House amendment offered/reported by : Substitute (A013) offered by Mr. Ferguson to the Burgess amendment (A012).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that research and development under the Act shall address issues with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that research and development under the Act shall address issues with respect to increased volatile emissions or increased nitrogen oxide emissions.
